name: The Dungeon (itch) (afkstudios)
description:
THE DUNGEON

The dungeon is a cartoon-style 3D platform puzzle game inspired by medieval times for PC.

The story begins with the legend of a great treasure hidden in Bamburgh Castle. Oliver, who is our main protagonist, will embark on his adventure and go in search of that treasure. 

Problems begin when Oliver is captured in the castle dungeons, and although everything seems to be going wrong, Oliver decides to escape from the dungeons and continue his treasure hunt.
